# pkg/

> Slauth Go backend core library

Key features:
- Multi-tenant architecture with isolated auth services
- Comprehensive authentication (Email, OAuth, SAML, OTP, MFA)
- Framework agnostic (works with Gin, Echo, Chi, net/http)
- Database support (PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite via GORM)
- Production-ready with extensive test coverage

## Getting Started

- [Quick Start](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth#quick-start): Basic setup with single-tenant
- [Multi-Tenant Guide](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth#multi-tenant-architecture): Multiple isolated auth services
- [API Documentation](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/thecybersailor/slauth): Go package documentation
- [README](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth#readme): Comprehensive project overview

## Architecture

- [Package Structure](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth/blob/main/pkg/docs/structure.md): Directory layout and responsibilities
- [Core Services](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth/blob/main/pkg/docs/services.md): AuthService, UserService, SessionService, etc
- [Models](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth/blob/main/pkg/docs/models.md): Database models and relationships
- [Controllers](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth/blob/main/pkg/docs/controllers.md): HTTP handlers and routing

## Key Concepts

- [Multi-Tenant Design](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth#multi-tenant-architecture): Cross-service access control
- [RequestValidator](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth#requestvalidator---the-key-to-cross-service-access): JWT validation middleware
- [Configuration](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth/tree/main/pkg/config): Runtime database-driven config
- [Providers](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth/tree/main/pkg/providers): OAuth, SAML, SMS, Email integrations

## Testing

- [Test Suite](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth/tree/main/tests): Comprehensive backend tests
- [Demo Application](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth/tree/main/demo): Example backend implementation

## Optional

- [Go Package](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/thecybersailor/slauth): Browse on pkg.go.dev
- [Source Code](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth/tree/main/pkg): Browse Go source files
- [OpenAPI Specs](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth/tree/main/docs/specs): API specifications
- [CONTRIBUTING](https://github.com/thecybersailor/slauth/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md): Development guidelines
